explains: n. 监禁，关押；分娩，生产
wordGroup: solitary confinement 单独拘禁（等于solitary）

sentences.en: Last night he was being held in solitary confinement in Douglas jail.
sentences.cn: 昨夜，他在道格拉斯监狱中被单独监禁。

sentences.en: Over-study hath done this, and somewhat too much of confinement.
sentences.cn: 这是过度学习和过度限制造成的。

sentences.en: It doesn't really mitigate against the confinement he has perpetrated on Lolita.
sentences.cn: 它没能减少他对洛丽塔的限制。
